alert.note: Alert for Idaho (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 11 at 10:37AM MDT until June 14 at 4:09PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Missoula MT has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Idaho... South Fork Clearwater River At Stites affecting Idaho County. For the Clearwater River...including At Stites...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork Clearwater River At At Stites. * WHEN...Until Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Expect possible flooding to state Highway 13 near the town of Harpster. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 1015 AM MDT /915 AM PDT/.
